title: Flow Site HTML
description: A reduced output with only the necessary divs SVGs and JS animations. Formatted for the Flow Website.

parameters.label: Output Folder
parameters.description: Folder name for export, relative to main export folder

parameters.label: Generate UI
parameters.description: Whether to generate a UI to control playback of the timeline.

parameters.label: Generate Full Page
parameters.description: Outputs artboards embedded in standard <html> tags.

parameters.label: Link to Animation Code
parameters.description: When true, adds a link to the animation's code.
